# Special Characters Test

This file contains CRUX special characters for testing token counting.

## Symbols

- Arrows: → ← 
- Priority: ≻ ≺
- Comparison: ≥ ≤ ≠
- Logic: ∀ ∃ ¬ ⊤ ⊥
- Relations: ∋ ⊳ ⊲
- CRUX delimiters: « » ⟨ ⟩
- Greek letters: Ρ Λ Π Κ Γ Φ Ω Δ
- Importance: ⊛ ◊

## Sample CRUX Block

```crux
⟦CRUX:special-chars.md
Κ{key→value}
R.rule{a∋b;c≻d}
∀x→process(x)
⟧
```
